item.title: 1.6.99-rc
item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Fix issues with clearing selection in folder\file browse dialog CHANGES FROM v1.5: * Add export order only option * Add image preview * Update checking (auto and manual update check) * Auto update installation * Incase steam game is being launched and steam is not running launch steam before starting the game * Add resume saved game option * Fix threading issue where Irony did not properly mark a patch collection as valid but instead as invalid * Add ignore file syntax to ignore rules * Add tooltip indicator showing where the file is from in mod compare selector (conflict solver) * Add context menu options in mod compare selector to open definition files\directories (conflict solver) * Fix actual conflict solver notification not showing * Add context menu option to paste mod name order * Add option to change game data directory * Small bugfixes\improvements I've forgot to mention

item.title: 1.6.98-rc
item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Center all popups * Folder browse dialog allow selecting folders * Change dialog behavior to behave more like windows folder\file browse dialogs * Add option to deselect files\folders via right click in folder\file browse dialogs * Small changes\fixes CHANGES FROM v1.5: * Add export order only option * Add image preview * Update checking (auto and manual update check) * Auto update installation * Incase steam game is being launched and steam is not running launch steam before starting the game * Add resume saved game option * Fix threading issue where Irony did not properly mark a patch collection as valid but instead as invalid * Add ignore file syntax to ignore rules * Add tooltip indicator showing where the file is from in mod compare selector (conflict solver) * Add context menu options in mod compare selector to open definition files\directories (conflict solver) * Fix actual conflict solver notification not showing * Add context menu option to paste mod name order * Add option to change game data directory * Small bugfixes\improvements I've forgot to mention

item.title: 1.6.92-alpha
item.description: RELEASE INFO: * Option screen tweaks * Add ability to parse actual environment variable paths found in launcher settings json * Center large popups * Tweaks and fixes to image preview CHANGES FROM v1.5: * Add export order only option * Add image preview * Update checking (auto and manual update check) * Auto update installation * Incase steam game is being launched and steam is not running launch steam before starting the game * Add resume saved game option * Fix threading issue where Irony did not properly mark a patch collection as valid but instead as invalid * Add ignore file syntax to ignore rules * Add tooltip indicator showing where the file is from in mod compare selector (conflict solver) * Add context menu options in mod compare selector to open definition files\directories (conflict solver) * Fix actual conflict solver notification not showing * Add context menu option to paste mod name order * Add option to change game data directory * Small bugfixes\improvements I've forgot to mention
